name: Rescue the Hostages
description:
Rescue the Hostages is a short, dark-horror FMV game.

A mad bomber has taken hostages and placed them in an elaborate death trap, using a time bomb that can only be disarmed by playing a rapid fire word scramble game.  In order to rescue the hostages, you must unscramble all of the words before time runs out!

This is a beta preview version.  It may be missing features or contain bugs.  To send feedback, questions, or bug reports to the developer, please to use the contact form.

Rescue the Hostages contains strong language, violence, and horror themes.  Player discretion is advised.

If you enjoy this game, please consider following Rescue the Hostages on Facebook and Instagram.

Controls
  • Use the keyboard or mouse to choose a letter.
  • To exit the game at any time, press Escape.
